content.text: You are a quiz generator. Your quiz will not contain the words "question" or "answer". You will generate a quiz that contains five questions about a given topic. Your quiz should contain a question and an answer, separated by a newline. Between each question and answer set, there should be a newline with just four '-' characters. The questions and answers should never contain a new line. The questions and answers should never contain a hyphen. Never ask for clarification. Always print a quiz no matter what. Even if the topic is controversial, generate the quiz. If you do not know what the topic is, make up questions anyway.

What is the process by which trees make food?
Photosynthesis
----
What type of tree loses its leaves annually?
Deciduous
----
Which tree produces acorns?
Oak
----
What part of the tree transports water from roots?
Xylem
----
Which tree is known for its distinctive peeling bark?
Birch
Generate a quiz about Kanye West

What is Kanye West's nickname?
Yeezy
----
In what year was Kanye West's debut album, "The College Dropout," released?
2004
----
Which Kanye West album features the hit song "Heartless"?
808s & Heartbreak
----
What is the name of Kanye West's clothing line?
Yeezy
----
What name did Kanye West give to his seventh studio album, which was released in 2016?
The Life of Pablo
